title: Designing Localization Strategies for IB Programs: Global Educational Leadership Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Course experiencing localization strategies through VR simulations via case analysis of Asian IB schools. Considers smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Strategies can be designed to adapt core components of the IB program (curriculum, language policy, teacher recruitment) to local educational contexts.
Simulation-based approaches can propose educational management plans reflecting the learning needs of multicultural student groups.
Project deliverables can establish execution plans for localizing global corporate training programs.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
